title: (x) McLaren Mercedes F1 Team 2006 season logo - Serene {Angel}
content:
Hello,

I would like to know what type is this one Formula 1 racing Team McLaren Mercedes has unveiled this current 2006 season.

Thanks.
author: themacosxflies

comments.content:
Oh well… I failed to include an image, it was my maiden post after all :)

Here is a link to the type I am looking for its name.

[http://img65.imageshack.us/img65/405/mclarentype3qn.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319044058/http:/img65.imageshack.us/img65/405/mclarentype3qn.jpg "http://img65.imageshack.us/img65/405/mclarentype3qn.jpg")

Hi - I'm not sure if anyone has replied to your message. The font used by McLaren appears to be a custom font based on Red Roosters Elstron Light font. Their version is extended by 160% and appears to be squared off more than the original. Certainly the lower case "c" is special because Elstron is a caps-only font. I would guess that an agency redrew the font for McLaren, or perhaps RR supplied a custom version.  
Hope that this helps!
Logos are not meant to be ordinary fonts.
... and ordinary fonts can be logos. This is based on Gerald Gallo's [Serene](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319044058/http:/www.identifont.com/show?4ET).
